name: Ball Breaker - Flappy Bounce
description:
Free time on your hands?
Fingers itching to have some fun?
*****************************************

Ballbreaker helps you kill time and de-stresses your mind one block at a time!
The more blocks you break, the more points you earn! More different ways to play to keep you addicted!

HOW TO PLAY
Classic mode: Choose an angle, swipe your finger, and launch your ball to break blocks to score high.
Wild mode: Bounce back to good 'ole Breakout! Swipe the platform left to right to keep the ball bouncing.


FEATURES
One-Handed- One single swipe to break the blocks!
Free Your Mind - Relaxed gameplay that keeps you entertained!
Addictively Fun - Simple to play, but challenging to win!
